title: Campout Music Festival
description:
#### Use Promo Code “DNSFAM” for 25% off Tickets!

**August 8 - 11, 2024**

**New Frontier Ranch in Ashland, Oregon | Must be 21+**

**Music Festival turned adult Summer Camp with a focus on Art, Music, Wellness, & Sustainability**

DR.FRESCH

THE FUNK HUNTERS

A HUNDRED DRUMS

AHEE B2B STYLUST

KENDOLL

KUMARION

SECRET RECIPE

SLYNK

STICKYBUDS

SUBSET

OVER 60 MORE DJS

#### 6 Unique Stages

Bass, Disco, Drum & Bass, Experiemental, Funk, Hip-hop, House, Trap, Techno, World, + Comedy, Talks, Workshops! *_Music runs Thursday - Sunday You are encouraged to spend Sunday night for a well nights rest and recovery from dancing!_

**Upgraded Lodging and Glamping** options with Cabins, Bunkalows, & Tipis!
**A Lake with a Waterslide**

**Disc Golf Course**

**PLUS Art Gallery, Arts & Crafts, Camp Activites, Family Field Games, Food & Marketplace Vendors, Live Painters, Performers, Workshops, Yoga, and MANY MORE SURPRISES!**

_THIS IS A LIMITED CAPACITY EVENT! GET YOUR TICKETS BEFORE THEY SELL OUT_!

Getting there:

5.5 hrs from San Francisco

5 hrs from Reno

4.5 hour drive from Portland

3 hrs from Bend

Fly into Medford Airport - Shuttle available
